about_the_game:
Welcome to "The MisAdventures of Xenos," a hilarious parody of classic fantasy RPGs! In this turn-based adventure, you play as Princess Fayne, who sets out to rescue her hero, Xenos, after he is kidnapped by one of the Demon Lord's underlings. With Fayne as the protagonist, this game turns the typical hero-rescues-princess trope on its head and gives players a fresh and entertaining perspective.



Prepare for an epic quest filled with crude humor and ridiculous antics as Fayne battles her way through a world of danger and mischief. The game features a classic turn-based combat system that pays homage to the RPGs of the past, complete with challenging bosses and a variety of strategic options to master.



With a retro-inspired 2D art style, there's plenty of visual charm to complement the game's irreverent humor. "The MisAdventures of Xenos" features meta jokes and fourth-wall-breaking humor that will keep you on your toes, as well as dark humor that may push the boundaries of good taste.



"The MisAdventures of Xenos" features a new game+ mode with a what-if quest line, adding even more content for players to enjoy. With numerous quests to complete, a full clear, of a single playthrough, taking around 6 hours, and a female protagonist who defies genre conventions, "The MisAdventures of Xenos" offers a fresh take on classic RPGs.

Whether you're a fan of turn-based combat or just looking for a good laugh, "The MisAdventures of Xenos" is sure to deliver an unforgettable gaming experience. So grab your sword and get ready to join Princess Fayne on an adventure you won't soon forget!

Controls
There is an in-game configuration tool for you to customize the controls as you wish, but here are the defaults:
  • Z to confirm
  • X to go back
  • Arrow keys to move the characters
  • Shift to walk
  • F2 displays the FPS counter
  • F3 fits game to window
  • F4 toggles fullscreen mode
  • F5 resets

Welcome to "The MisAdventures of Xenos," a hilarious parody of classic fantasy RPGs! In this turn-based adventure, you play as Princess Fayne, who sets out to rescue her hero, Xenos, after he is kidnapped by one of the Demon Lord's underlings. With Fayne as the protagonist, this game turns the typical hero-rescues-princess trope on its head and gives players a fresh and entertaining perspective.



Prepare for an epic quest filled with crude humor and ridiculous antics as Fayne battles her way through a world of danger and mischief. The game features a classic turn-based combat system that pays homage to the RPGs of the past, complete with challenging bosses and a variety of strategic options to master.



With a retro-inspired 2D art style, there's plenty of visual charm to complement the game's irreverent humor. "The MisAdventures of Xenos" features meta jokes and fourth-wall-breaking humor that will keep you on your toes, as well as dark humor that may push the boundaries of good taste.



"The MisAdventures of Xenos" features a new game+ mode with a what-if quest line, adding even more content for players to enjoy. With numerous quests to complete, a full clear, of a single playthrough, taking around 6 hours, and a female protagonist who defies genre conventions, "The MisAdventures of Xenos" offers a fresh take on classic RPGs.

Whether you're a fan of turn-based combat or just looking for a good laugh, "The MisAdventures of Xenos" is sure to deliver an unforgettable gaming experience. So grab your sword and get ready to join Princess Fayne on an adventure you won't soon forget!

Controls
There is an in-game configuration tool for you to customize the controls as you wish, but here are the defaults:
  • Z to confirm
  • X to go back
  • Arrow keys to move the characters
  • Shift to walk
  • F2 displays the FPS counter
  • F3 fits game to window
  • F4 toggles fullscreen mode

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

name: The MisAdventures of Xenos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 21:9 aspect ratio supported

short_description: "Princess Fayne leads in "The MisAdventures of Xenos," a hilarious, turn-based RPG parody. Full of crude humor, meta jokes, and retro graphics, enjoy a fresh take on classic RPGs with new game+ mode. Discover a what-if quest line and defy genre conventions. Clear in 6 hours. Join the adventure now!"
